"It's an innovative entree that goes from printer to pan," said Giuseppe Scionti, founder of Nova Meat. Scionti came up with the idea two years ago. Since then, he's been printing and preparing vegan steaks like this for people around the world''It's about new meat, it means plant-based meat substitutes.
